quotes.quote: Honor - If you need it defined, you don't have it.

quotes.quote: Greatness itself - The best revenge.

quotes.quote: Skim milk - Avoid it.
quotes.author: Swanson Pyramid Of Greatness: Category 7

quotes.quote: Cursing - There's only one bad word: Taxes. If any other word is good enough for sailors, it's good enough for you.
quotes.author: Swanson Pyramid Of Greatness: Category 7

quotes.quote: Friends - One to three is sufficient.
quotes.author: Swanson Pyramid Of Greatness: Category 8

quotes.quote: Property rights - They exist. Do not let them be taken away from you.
quotes.author: Swanson Pyramid Of Greatness: Category 8

quotes.quote: Masonry - Building walls makes you strong. Defending them makes you even stronger.

quotes.quote: Cabins - A place to rest that is made of logs.
quotes.author: Swanson Pyramid Of Greatness: Category 8

quotes.quote: Perspiration - Only sweat during physical activity or love making. No emotional sweating.

quotes.quote: You - You are your biggest ally.

quotes.quote: Crying - Acceptable at funerals and the Grand Canyon.

quotes.quote: Frankness - Cut the B.S.

quotes.quote: Capitalism - God's way of determining who is smart, and who is poor.
quotes.author: Swanson Pyramid Of Greatness: Category 9

quotes.quote: Facial hair - Full, thick and square. Nothing sculpted. If you have to sculpt it, that probably means you can't grow it.
quotes.author: Swanson Pyramid Of Greatness: Category 9

quotes.quote: Living in the woods - Live off the land.
quotes.author: Swanson Pyramid Of Greatness: Category 9

quotes.quote: Rage - One rage every three months is permitted. Try not to hurt anyone who doesn't deserve it.
quotes.author: Swanson Pyramid Of Greatness: Category 9

quotes.quote: Security - Secure the land.
quotes.author: Swanson Pyramid Of Greatness: Category 9

quotes.quote: Poise - Sting like a bee. Do not float like a butterfly. That's ridiculous.

quotes.quote: Handshakes - Firm, Dry, Solid. 3 seconds.

quotes.quote: Body grooming - Only women shave beneath the neck.
